jobTitle: Data Analytics and Insights Analyst - Vice President
jobDescription: Working across CWM Operations teams and critical partners to assist in determining key data requirements  Envisioning, orchestrating, and building strategic insights and opportunities to continuously improve our business  Identifying opportunities for automation and scorecarding to ensure key process improvement opportunities are identified and socialized  Analyzing business results with an eye towards recommendations for enhancement  Evaluating data to identify drivers of volumes and emerging trends  Developing visualizations of analytics insights for consumption by stakeholders  Supporting ad-hoc reporting and analytics requests  5+ years of Analytics experience with a focus on large datasets and predictive analytics  4+ years of demonstrated analytical skills and experience with reporting tools like SSRS, SSAS, QlikView, QlikSense, or Tableau  Proficient with SQL query development  Minimum 3 years experience working with large corporate databases/applications  Excellent analytical and problem resolution skills  Ability to synthesize large amounts of data to tell a relevant story  Strong quantitative and critical thinking skills with capacity to learn quickly  Strong ability to communicate with stakeholders across functions and at all levels  Proven verbal and written communication skills  Bachelor’s degree required, advanced degree desired, with preferred concentration in Math, Statistics, Economics, or similar quantitative disciplines
